features.name: Dashboard Overview
features.description: Main dashboard page showing metrics, charts, and tables for rubber trading analytics

features.name: Daily Selling Price Chart
features.description: Line chart showing daily selling prices for SIR20, RSS, and SIR3L products

features.name: Stok Bebas Table
features.description: Table displaying stock information including production stock, outstanding contracts, and free stock

features.name: Top 5 Buyers/Products Charts
features.description: Pie charts showing top 5 buyers and products with filtering by product type

features.name: Monthly Volume/Revenue Charts
features.description: Bar charts showing monthly volume and revenue with RKAP comparison

features.name: App Layout
features.description: Main application layout with sidebar, topbar, and responsive design
